inscription: Hana no iro wa/ utsurinikeri na/ itazura ni/ waga mi yo ni furu/ nagame seshi ma ni 花の色は　うつりにけりな　いたつらに　わか身よにふる　なかめせしまに (Like cherry blossoms after a long spring rain,/ beautiful colors quickly fade./ While I have vainly been seeing/ the time passing by me/ and the world.)
markings: censor seal: kiwame 極; publisher\'s seal: Eijudō 永寿堂
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
portfolio: From One Hundred Poems Explained by the Nurse (Hyakunin isshu uba ga etoki 百人一首うはか縁説)
signed: Saki no Hokusai Manji 前北斎卍
title: Poem by Ono no Komachi
